title: Meta Freezes AI Hiring Amid Restructuring
description: Meta has halted AI division hiring amidst a restructuring of its Superintelligence Lab following a massive recruitment drive that included offering exorbitant compensation packages to lure talent from competitors.

title: GitHub Enhances Copilot Integration with New Agents Panel
description: GitHub introduces an Agents Panel, allowing developers to launch Copilot coding tasks from any page on the platform, streamlining the development workflow.
